snippet: To support their sides, supporters and opponents each point to Mayor Bill de Blasio’s campaign message of bridging the gap in the “tale of two cities.”
abstract: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio faces issue of revitalizing an unused garbage transfer station at East 91st Street, just three blocks north of Gracie Mansion; reopening of former waste station has become protracted issue involving race, class and geographic equity; supporters and opponents each point to de Blasio’s campaign message of bridging the gap in the 'tale of two cities.'
lead_paragraph: To support their sides, supporters and opponents each point to Mayor Bill de Blasio’s campaign message of bridging the gap in the “tale of two cities.”

headline.main: Fight Awaits de Blasio on Opening Upper East Side Trash Transfer Site
headline.print_headline: Fight Awaits de Blasio on Opening Upper East Side Trash Transfer Site
